name: Image Before After Addon for Elementor – WPTD
author: wpthemedevelopers

sections.description:
The #1 Image Before After Addon for Elementor

WPTD Image Before After is advanced elementor image compare plugin. You can easily compare two images by selection. Also we Provide here horizontal and vertical options too.

Rate

  • Please rate the plugin
  • Read people reviews

The Features

Image Before After showing vertical and horizontal sliders and many features:
Also you can apply many options as we mentioned some examples below

  1. Orientation (Horizontal/Vertical).
  2. Default Offset(default slider range from 0 – 1).
  3. Move slider on mouse hover?.
  4. Allow a user to swipe.
  5. Allow a user to click (or tap) anywhere on the image to move the slider to that location.
  6. Enable overlay option for show before after labels
  7. Any theme support
  8. Easy to Use.

Live Demo

  • WPTD Image Before After Live Demo

Contact Us for More Works

  • WordPress Theme Developers
  • Wide News Hub
  • EMI Calculator Plugin Work Sample
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘wptd-image-compare’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now read How of Use
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.

Can I extend the plugin or options?

Absolutely! Feel free contact us. We can upgrade or create plugins.

  • WP Theme Developers
sections.screenshots:
1. **Goto Elementor page builder. Search keywords like "compare". You can get our Image Compare shortcode.

  2. **Search tab wise Our Image Compare shortcode under WPTD tab.

  3. **Image compare with horizontal slider.

  4. **Image compare with vertical slider.

  5. **Image compare with both horizontal and vertical slideron same section.
sections.reviews:
The problem with the "After"

By kickermax on June 14, 2023

A good plugin, everything works fine.

But there is a problem. The inscription "after" is displayed, but copies the content "before".

It is fixed very easily. In the file image-compare.php (along the way wptd-image-compare/trunk/widgets/image-compare.php) in function renderduring subsequent rendering, "data-before" and "data-after" have the same tokens (thats all).

echo sprintf('<figure class="%1$s" data-offset="%2$s" data-orientation="%3$s" data-move="%4$s" data-swipe="%5$s" data-hover="%6$s" data-noverlay="%7$s" data-before="%8$s" data-after="%8$s">',

Just change last data-after for "%9$s"
